articles.content: You've most likely never seen an ant like this before: in an ultra-closeup, Lithuanian photographer Eugenijus Kavaliauskas snapped a shot of an ant's face that looks like a still from some fantasy ep… [+2312 chars]

articles.author: Callie Ahlgrim
articles.title: Taylor Swift's best new song is 'Would've, Could've, Should've' - Insider
articles.description: Taylor Swift's new album is largely unsatisfactory, but the extended "Midnights (3am Edition)" includes one of Swift's most powerful songs yet.
articles.content:
Taylor Swift's 10th studio album was greeted last Friday with astonishing commercial success, but a tepid reaction from Insider's music team.
